high_descs: Turn to the right facing the bed with the book on top of it
Pick up the book sitting on the bed
Carry the book across from the bed to the desk lamp on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Carry a book while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn right and face the bed.
Pick up the book near the pillow.
Turn left and look at the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a book by the light of lamp.

high_descs: Walk forward, then turn right to face the bed.
Pick up the book off of the bed.
Turn around and walk forward, then turn right and walk up to the small lamp on the wooden table.
Turn on the light of the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a book in the light of a small lamp.
